text: today's class was trying to find a way
to give some of the tool even as a
simple tool to use against a potential
attack the best that we could do was
kind of like turn on the light and allow
people just to see that they're not
alone that's like a queer woman of color
I know that I live under the threat of
constant violence it's the norm but I
know that it's not normal and I know
that this isn't what life should be I
feel like there's a lot of movement and
energy happening at the grassroots level
which is where I think most of our power
is and I also see my community
reclaiming a lot for ourselves and
